name: Leaking
description:
This game is inspired by Sun Yuan and Peng Yu's "Can't Help Myself" dystopian robotic art-piece, commissioned for the Guggenheim Museum. You play as the robotic arm, attempting to sweep liquid in a constant cycle.

Please fill out this short survey after playing the game: https://forms.gle/vgKDHQmRNC6orZEWA 

The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible:

- Turn the arm using the mouse.

- Press (1) and (2) to raise the two sections of your robotic arm individually.

- Allow gravity to lower the arm.

- Sweep leaking fluid back towards you to prevent it from flowing away.

- Hit green orbs to restore your health and white orbs to increase the size of your brush.

Post your high score!! :)
